channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pain all over pavement down the road., 13th August
item.description:
Hi, Senrab Street recently got resurfaced. The actual surfacing is to a good standard. This was also done quickly. What i can't understand at all is the total mess on the payments of left over paint and words such as 'KEEP CLEAR' and 'SCHOOL' etc fully left over. Ive tried to take some photos but it makes both sides of the pavement look a total mess. Why wasnt this done in chalk? Why actual paint. It's honestly a complete mess to an otherwise lovely road.

Report on FixMyStreet
